sourcesContent:
// src/pages/Dashboard.jsx import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { samplePatient } from "../utils/patientData"; export default function Dashboard() { const [patient, setPatient] = useState(null); const [loggedIn, setLoggedIn] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const isLogged = localStorage.getItem("hc_isLoggedIn") === "true"; const uid = localStorage.getItem("hc_userId"); if (!isLogged || !uid) { setLoggedIn(false); return; } // Demo: use samplePatient if id matches or anytime for demo // In production replace with API call to fetch patient by id setPatient(samplePatient); }, []); if (!loggedIn) { // not logged in -> redirect to sign in return ; } if (!patient) { return (
Loading patient profile...
); } return (
{/* Title */}

Patient Profile

Personal details, medical history and prescriptions

 {/* Grid: left bio & status, right details */}
{/* Bio & Status */}
{patient.name}
{patient.age} years • {patient.sex}
Blood: {patient.bloodGroup}
Phone: {patient.contact.phone}
Email: {patient.contact.email}
Address: {patient.contact.address}
Emergency: {patient.emergencyContact.name} - {patient.emergencyContact.phone}
Allergies: {Array.isArray(patient.allergies) ? patient.allergies.join(", ") : patient.allergies}
Current Status
{patient.currentStatus.status}
Since: {patient.currentStatus.since}
{patient.currentStatus.notes}
Pharmacy
{patient.pharmacy.status}
ETA: {new Date(patient.pharmacy.deliveryETA).toLocaleString()}
{/* Right: doctors, history, prescriptions (two column area spans 2 columns on lg) */}

Assigned Doctor

Primary & Assistant
{patient.assignedDoctor.name}
{patient.assignedDoctor.specialty}
Contact: {patient.assignedDoctor.contact}
{patient.assistantDoctor.name}
{patient.assistantDoctor.specialty}
Contact: {patient.assistantDoctor.contact}

Medical History

Past visits & conditions
{patient.medicalHistory.map((h, i) => (
{h.date}
{h.condition}
{h.notes}
Visit #{i + 1}
 ))}

Prescriptions

Recent prescriptions
{patient.prescriptions.map((p) => (
{p.doctor} • {new Date(p.date).toLocaleDateString()}
{p.notes}
    {p.meds.map((m, idx) => (
  • {m.name} — {m.dosage}, {m.frequency}, {m.duration}
    • ))}
Sent to Pharmacy
ETA: {new Date(patient.pharmacy.deliveryETA).toLocaleTimeString()}
 ))}
); }
